Home -> Events -> TvT Current online:



Description: Two teams compete, earning points for PvP. The team that scores 300 points faster will win.
Conditions for registration: Level 76 and 3 rebirths.
Goal: Kill as many opponents from other teams as possible.
Schedule (GMT +3): 02:00, 05:00, 08:00, 11:00, 14:00, 17:00, 23:00.
Reward: Winning Ticket 2 pcs. and Hidden Card 2 pcs.
Top Kill Reward: Winning Ticket 2 pcs. and Hidden Card 2 pcs.
